description: High-precision gaming mouse with 7 programmable buttons and adjustable DPI settings.
RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile switches for the ultimate gaming experience.
True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and 24-hour battery life.
Adjustable smartphone stand with cable management for desk or bedside.
5-fan cooling pad for laptops up to 17 inches with adjustable height settings.
Fast-charging power bank with dual USB ports and USB-C input/output.
Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor
Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 12-hour battery life and deep bass.
10W fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.
